definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: see 反式脂肪[fan3 shi4 zhi1 fang2]

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

sentences.english: Ketone bodies are short-chain derivatives of fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 酮體是脂肪酸的短鏈衍生物。

sentences.english: The fatty acids are then converted by the organisms to an aldehyde that includes a carbon atom bonded to an oxygen atom (together they create what's called a carbonyl group).
sentences.chinese: 脂肪酸被生物體轉化成包含碳氧雙鍵即羰基的醛。

sentences.english: In the blood the fatty acid and the ketone body big trough increase when.
sentences.chinese: 血中脂肪酸和酮體大盆增加時。

sentences.english: Study on the use of acetic anhydride as a co reagent of fatty acid to synthesize cellulose esters.
sentences.chinese: 採用乙酸酐爲共反應劑合成了纖維素高級脂肪酸酯。

sentences.english: Methods The components and contents of fatty acids in spanish mackerel oil were determined by gas chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 方法用氣相色譜法測定鮁魚中脂肪酸的組成及含量。

sentences.english: Antisepsis and fresh-keeping effects of polyol fatty acid ester are summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了多元醇脂肪酸酯的防腐保鮮作用。

sentences.english: And, polyunsaturated fats contain essential fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 而且，多不飽和脂肪包含重要的脂肪酸。

sentences.english: Soap General term for the "salt" of a fatty acid.
sentences.chinese: 皁基對脂肪酸鹽的一般性稱呼。

sentences.english: Physicochemical properties and fatty acid compositions of jujube kernel oil were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對酸棗仁油的理化性質和脂肪酸組成進行了分析。

sentences.english: Omega-3s appear to be safe for most adults at low-to-moderate doses.
sentences.chinese: 中低劑量的Ω脂肪酸對大都成年人好像是安全的。

sentences.english: Diets rich in Omega fatty acids are instrumental in keeping your brain from aging.
sentences.chinese: 食用豐富的歐米茄脂肪酸對預防大腦老化是有幫助的。

sentences.english: Analysis of the composition and content of UFAS in transgenic strains.
sentences.chinese: 第四分析轉基因集胞藻多不飽和脂肪酸的組成和含量。

sentences.english: Fatty acids were isolated from Arnebia euchroma for the first time and fatty acid lactones have been firstly isolated from Boraginaceae plants.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪酸內酯爲首次從紫草科植物中分離得到。

sentences.english: Fat provides essential fatty acids and helps your body absorb certain vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪提供重要的脂肪酸幫助身體吸收特定的維生素。

sentences.english: KFC claims 0g trans fat per serving for all their fried chicken.
sentences.chinese: 肯德基聲稱它們的炸雞中不含反式脂肪酸。

sentences.english: There's a growing awareness about the health-giving effects of omega fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 人們日益認識到ω脂肪酸對健康的影響。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
duo1 yuan2 bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
